Title: Enacts the "Give Kids a Chance - Carter's Law"; mandates health insurance coverage for congenital anomalies
Summary: Enacts the "Give Kids a Chance - Carter's Law" mandating health insurance coverage for congenital anomalies including certain reconstructive services, habilitative services, and inpatient and outpatient services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to enacting the "Give Kids a Chance - Carter's Law" mandating health insurance coverage for congenital anomalies
